description: If you’re ready to wander the wasteland and seldom, if ever, check on settlements, here are the best mods to get the most out of the experience like cover mechanics, fast outfits swapping, better-looking NPCs, craftable ammo, a more gorgeous looking environment, and a cinematic camera to document it all.
title: When You Don't Care About Fallout 4 Settlements

description:
With the announcement of a new Batman VR game this week, Tam and Lucy lament the fact that there's no new Rocksteady Batman on the horizon, and wonder if WB has squandered the Bat. 

#gaming #batmanarkham #gamespot
title: What's Become Of Batman Games? | Spot On

description:
If you’re ready to wander the wasteland and seldom, if ever, check on settlements, here are the best mods to get the most out of the experience like cover mechanics, fast outfits swapping, better-looking NPCs, craftable ammo, a more gorgeous looking environment, and a cinematic camera to document it all.

The recent next-gen update for Fallout 4 broke many of its mods, but not this batch. In this video, we’re covering the best Fallout 4 mods that still work specifically for players who don’t like base building. We’re hitting the wasteland to cover FO4 Hotkeys, Take Cover, Outfit Switcher - Hotkey Loadouts, Vivid Fallout - All In One Mod, True Storms - Wasteland Edition (Thunder-Rain-Weather Redone), Fallout Faces, Better Companions - All In One, and Craftable Ammo. You can find all of these over at Nexus Mods where players gather to make Bethesda’s notoriously buggy games even better. Fallout 4 has recently seen a huge surge in players, especially on Steam, with a recent sale alongsid
title: Best Fallout 4 Mods For People That Don't Care About Settlements
